text: Gula language may refer to several African languages: * Three closely related Bua languages in southern Chad * Two less closely related Bongo-Baguirmi languages: ** Gula language (Chad) ** Tar Gula language in the Central African Republic and Sudan * Gola language in Liberia ==See also== *Gullah language, an African-English creole on the southern coast of the United States
title: Gula language
